name: Christopher Hacia
title: Lead / Senior Web & Software Developer / Engineer

experience.description: Develop and maintain systems in Node.js, Socket.IO, Angular, Python, PHP, and MySQL. Leveraged AWS Lambda.

Worked for multiple companies such as FMGlobal and Wells Fargo Bank. Covered the roles of Lead Solution Architect and Software Engineer. Utilized ReactJS, jQuery, and various other frameworks and tools.
Worked on the 3rd party sales platforms. Worked with ReactJS, React Native, Redux, GraphQL, Node.js.

experience.company: Contingent Worker via Pyramid Consulting Facebook
experience.description: Worked in the internals tier, developing tooling for Ownership and management for files, process, and more. Utilized React.js, GraphQL via Relay.js, Flow.js, and PHP.

experience.company: Contingent Worker via Pyramid Consulting Intuit
experience.description: Worked with the Quickbooks ProAdvisor Accountant team, building out new features and components with ReactJS and GraphQL. Also supported the product by finding and fixing bugs and security issues. Utilized Jest and esLint for unit testing and code quality.

experience.company: Contingent Worker via Pyramid Consulting Walmart Labs
experience.description: Worked on the Account-Post Transaction Team on walmart.com. Built, maintained, and enhanced the user experience of a user's account and transaction history needs. Built end-to-end automation using Nightwatch.js. Worked with Hapi.js, Node.js, ReactJS, Redux, and GraphQL. Also utilized Git and Jenkins in the CI/CD pipeline.

Worked with the DNAC team, developing an automated end-to-end testing suite using CodeCeptJS. Enhanced client-facing tooling and developed new features on the customer-facing platform for DNAC using NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, jQuery, ReactJS, and Redux. Redesigned the middleware communication from server to client with Axios.js. Ensured code quality using CSDL (Cisco Secure Development Lifecycle).

experience.position: Lead & Senior Software Engineer Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Built a software-as-a-service application from the ground up using CodeIgniter & Symfony PHP MVC Frameworks. Managed local and offshore development teams along with a QA team. Oversaw service architecture and deployment on AWS EC2.

experience.position: Lead & Senior Software Engineer Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed and managed projects for various companies and clients using CodeIgniter, Zend Framework, WordPress CMS, and other frameworks.
Rebranded and enhanced features of a cloud-based Backup and Disaster Recovery service. Utilized Zend Framework and ReactJS.
